name: Ouroboros (itch) (Kibe)
description:
When the snake tries to bite it's own tail, but the tail don't like this idea.

This game is based on Ouroboros: Escape the Mouth. Wich was made for JimJam 2, a 48 hour game jam hosted by Tim Ruswick. The original prject was actually placed as 20th in the overall category between over 140 entries.
